original: intros m x y z. unfold m1, y0. intros Hinv_hexp_hexpz. assert (Hnotexpf1: ~ expf (L m one x y) y0 z) by (apply not_expf_L1_y0 with (z := z) in Hinv_hexp_hexpz; auto). assert (Hnotexpf2: ~ expf (L m one x y) x z) by (apply not_expf_L1_x with (z := z) in Hinv_hexp_hexpz; auto). apply expf_L1_eq in Hinv_hexp_hexpz as Heq_exp; auto. rewrite Heq_exp. apply Iter_cF_L1_i; auto.
